features: ULTIMATE PROTECTION & VERSATILITY: COLD, WIND, DUST, SNOW, SLEET, RAIN, UV and other elements are no match. You can wear this balaclava on its own or under a helmet with goggles/glasses as a full face mask cover, open balaclava, half ski mask or neck gaiter. Warm gifts for men women this winter!

SUPERFINE STRETCH FLEECE: Get the most comfort out of your experiences. The Stretch Fleece offers extra warmth and protection, even when temperatures are freezing; This non-irritating fabric is lightweight, stretchy, soft and breathable with no pilling, deformation, fading and weird smells, protects your face from moisture.

NO FOGGING UP: Ergonomic nose design with cushioned pad and mesh panel increase airflow while minimizing condensation on your goggles. Perfect for outdoor activities like skiing, motorcycling, bicycling, snowboarding, running, mountain climbing, hiking, trekking, etc. Note the nose pad is specially designed for men with glasses to prevent fogging up. Ignore that when you are not wearing the glasses, it's comfortable and will fit well.

ULTIMATE WINDPROOF PROTECTION: The ski mask gives you the option to cover your entire face and features an extra-long neck section for superior wind and cold protection; The face and neck areas adopt 3-layer composite wind & water-protection fabric, blocking out all the cold elements while keeping the heat in.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Both for men and women with a head circumference of 25” or less.
body.description: Why Choose AstroAI's Ski Mask Balaclava? AstroAI Ski Mask is made of superfine soft, comfortable fleece, which is thicker, softer, lighter, and free of unpleasant odours. It gives you ultimate protection from cold, wind, dust, the sun’s UV rays, and any other elements while keeping the warmth in. The breathable mesh fabric designed for the mouth area, keeps you breathing freely, without feeling stifled or stuffy, and also helps prevent fogging of glasses or goggles. Intended Use: Skiing, Snowboarding, Motorcycling, Running, Biking, Trekking, Mountain Climbing and other outdoor activities Ways to Wear: a full face mask cover, open balaclava, half ski mask or neck gaiter 4-Way Stretch Fabric: recommend for men or women with a head circumference of 25” or less Material: 92% polyester, 8% spandex

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: “For All of Life’s Adventures” is more than a slogan for us; it’s a lifestyle and core philosophy. AstroAI supports the adventurer within and we encourage our customers to take risks and push the envelope. We don’t choose products based on market interests or fancy analytics. We develop tools and products for ourselves and our customers based on real-world needs and expectations. Why Choose AstroAI's Ski Mask Balaclava? AstroAI Ski Mask is made of superfine soft, comfortable fleece, which is thicker, softer, lighter, and free of unpleasant odours. It gives you ultimate protection from cold, wind, dust, the sun’s UV rays, and any other elements while keeping the warmth in. The breathable mesh fabric designed for the mouth area, keeps you breathing freely, without feeling stifled or stuffy, and also helps prevent fogging of glasses or goggles. Intended Use: Skiing, Snowboarding, Motorcycling, Running, Biking, Trekking, Mountain Climbing and other outdoor activities Ways to Wear: a full face mask cover, open balaclava, half ski mask or neck gaiter 4-Way Stretch Fabric: recommend for men or women with a head circumference of 25” or less Material: 92% polyester, 8% spandex

No Fogging Up Ergonomic nose design with cushioned pad and mesh panel offers superior breathability, moisture-wicking coverage while minimizing condensation on your goggles. Windproof & Waterproof Design The face and neck areas adopt 3-layer composite wind & water-protection fabric, blocking out all the cold elements while keeping the heat in. Highly Breathable Insulated mesh panel increases airflow; The fit is flexible and design is durable with a refined sewing process to increase its lifespan. Super Warm Fleece The Stretch Fleece offers extra warmth and protection, even when temperatures are freezing. The fabric will not fade or ball and is lightweight, non-irritating to the skin.

Full Coverage Design This mask gives you the option to cover your entire face and features an extra-long neck section for superior wind and cold protection; Perfect for outdoor activities like skiing, snowboarding, motorcycling, etc. Helmet & Goggles Friendly You can wear the balaclava on its own or under a helmet with goggles/glasses. Designed with high- quality mesh breathing panels which will increase airflow while preventing fogging of glasses or goggles. Versatile Function Choose the style of the balaclava according to your actual needs: a full face mask cover, open balaclava, half ski mask, hoodie, or neck gaiter. Whatever you like!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What not to like?
reviews.reviewText: I've spent a good amount of time riding the motorcycle in 20's and 30's with this thing on. Was it cold? Yes. Was my neck cold? No. My neck stayed very warm despite the temperatures. There was only one time when the cold outside started to bite in a little bit, and the windchill being well below zero was a good reason for that. I put a full lined fleece one over it, since it is much thinner than you expect and it kept all the air out and was fine after. Wash it regularly though. I had noticed it stretches out a slight bit around my face when I leave it unwashed for a few a week or so, but it does snug back up when you get it back out of the dryer. It is modular, and the cap design doesn't get into my face putting my helmet on, and it's nice to be able to pull the face mask down when I don't really need it. The mesh on the front is nice to be able to breath through, and typically doesn't fog my windshield unless I leave the vents closed. Over all, I highly recommend it for winter rides, or to take for skiing or whatever ever other winter fun you like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a pretty good product
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for when I ride my motorcycle when it's cold. It's overall a decent product, especially for the price.It has a very soft lining on the inside, great for taking it easy on the face's skin. It fits very snugly thanks to the spandex. My helmet doesn't fog up anyways because of my pinlock system, but I could see it being very effective for fog. I love the fact that you can independently move around the top and bottom layer. Thanks to this you can make it cover the maximum amount of skin, and don't have to worry about openings being created because you bunch the fabric together like with other products. It can be a beanie and neck warmer or a balaclava. Pretty awesome design with respective to that aspect.I do have a few issues though, which is why I'm not giving it 5 stars. For one, it's not really thick enough/insulated enough to keep warm in the cold, especially going 65 mph. Now, to be fair, that's probably not what they were intending on it to do.My other issue is that nose piece that comes out across the bridge. I get it's for preventing fog and all that, but it just drives me insane. Any time I pull the bottom layer down to get it right on my face, this little piece of fabric is pulled out. And if you want the mask to cover as much of your face as possible, then you can't use that nose part because it gets in the way of your vision. This is pretty minor, but still something.My last issue, again a minor one, I wish they had made the piece that goes over the bridge adjustable or make it a much tighter fit. It just doesn't quite cover the bending of the nose perfectly.But the ABSOLUTE best thing about this product??? Since I can move the upper and lower pieces independently, I can FINALLY bring out my inner ninja..... Fear me....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you ride, This is for you.
reviews.reviewText: The Astro AI Ski Mask Windproof Balaclava is warm, windproof, and thin enough to fit under your helmet. It is everything they say it is. The picture is accurate and it doesn't stretch out and become floppy after use. It breathes in spite of being windproof. Chin portion can be lowered to jaw level without being uncomfortable to prevent visor fog up and allow com use. Interior is soft brushed material of some sort, feels and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with product
reviews.reviewText: Mask works great against the wind. Easy to breathe. Doesn't move when putting on helmet. Keeps head and face warm and it's lightweight material. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works but still fogs my glasses.
reviews.reviewText: Works OK. Kinda thin. Is breathable but if covering your mouth it still fogs my glasses.This was why I bought one to replace my other balaklava because it too fogs my glasses.I guess the answer is to get ski goggles...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very warm and cozy. Optional to wear the top part so can be used just to cover your face as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Deffinetly holds to its value. Can keep ya warm in decently cold weather while on a roof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I brought this for riding my ebike as its been very cold and its been great. Keeps the wind out and keeps you warm, the nose support is great as it stops the mask from falling down and keeps it in place. Highly recommend
Ist ein super Wind und Wetter Schutz.
